note:
Indoors/outdoors enthusiast. Excited about skiing (meditation in motion!), cycling, climbing, walkable cities, history, veganism, programming as a craft and way of learning about the world, etc.

Software developer at Microsoft, building communication software.

Before that I used to make browsers better at Mozilla. Mostly mobile ones. If you still have feelings about Firefox for Android rewrite - you can yell at me, I was there!

Also, various startups, and RIM BlackBerry in late 2000s.
